summary: The diff appears to address centering/framing primarily by introducing new CharacterDock wrapper elements and (per the index.css file summary) updating Character Dock styling (height/padding/centering/overflow). However, it also includes unrequested changes to the 3D rendering stack (error boundary/WebGL fallback) and adjustments to camera/model positioning, which go beyond the requested “UI frame/layout/styling” approach.

hallucinated_features.reason: The request calls for fixing clipping/centering by adjusting the UI frame/layout/styling, not by changing the character/model transforms as the primary approach. The diff includes model transform adjustments that are outside the requested UI-only focus.
